text: Phir to her aik ko hum ney uss kay gunah ka wabaal mein giriftar ker liya inn mein say baaz per hum ney pathron ka menh barsaya aur inn mein say baaz ko zor daar awaz sakht awaz ney daboch liya aur inn mein say baaz ko hum ney zamin mein dhansa diya aur inn mein say baaz ko hum ney dobo diya Allah Taalaa aisa nahi kay unn per zulm keray bulkay yehi log apni jano per zulm kertay thay
